history.text: Hello! I am Phoenix, your mental health chatbot. How can I help you today?
Tell me more about what's happening with your studies.  What specifically is causing you stress?  Knowing more will help me understand how to best support you.
i am facing a lot of barriers will studing

I hear you're facing challenges with your studies.  That sounds really tough. Can you tell me a little more about what's making it difficult?  Knowing more will help me understand how to best support you.
like i cant understand the topics clearly , i have lots of pressure on studies like i have to very good in studies i feel like i can't do that

I hear you.  It sounds like you're feeling a lot of pressure and struggling to grasp some of your course material. That's completely understandable.  Let's try to break this down.  Would you like to talk about what's making you feel overwhelmed, or perhaps explore some strategies for better understanding the topics and managing the pressure?
